title: Hunting the Five
description: Welcome to straight out of Hell.Stripped of her memories, her name, and her power, De La Roca has spent the last three hundred years as a mercenary to pay for her release from the inferno. When the Angel returns to offer her a bargain, five final kills in exchange for true freedom, will she be able to rise to the challenge, or will she die trying?  Hunting the Five, (28,000 words / approximately 112 pages) is the first novella in the exciting De la Roca Chronicles from Airam Publications. This special edition comes with two sneak previews and a bonus short story!
author: Maria Violante
